Reviews.Title: Great Package
Reviews.Author: Larry W. Gaulin
Reviews.Content: This is my first SLR and this camera is amazing.  I wish I would have bought one years ago.  A lot to learn if you want to get adventurous but very easy to snap pictures within minutes of opening using the auto mode.

Reviews.Title: I just love this new camera!  Having a blast taking high speed pictures of the dogs!
Reviews.Author: L. Mckinnon "Laura"
Reviews.Content: I just love this new camera!  Having a blast taking high speed pictures of the dogs!  So much to learn but the auto settings make it very easy to get started.

Reviews.Title: Flash sucks, everything else was what I expected.
Reviews.Author: Jared Chase
Reviews.Content: Everything was great except the flash sold in this package wasn't compatible with the camera.  Everything else was what I expected.

Reviews.Title: I had 2 of these both had Debris on the sensor out of the box
Reviews.Author: davidfelts
Reviews.Content: I had 2 of these both had Debris on the sensor out of the box.Image quality is not good at low light . I will never own another Nikon Customer service was great bought a Canon 70D I love it

Reviews.Title: Review of NIKON d7100 camera package
Reviews.Author: drGunter
Reviews.Content: Excellant camera with outstanding features. The lens provided are of top quality. This is an outstanding and complete package. With a high level camera such as the D7100 one may operate on auto mode or use the advanced features for professional results. The camera is very easy to operate.
